content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, I'm glad you find the apartment to your liking. Let's focus on the rental price. How much are you willing to pay?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm a student so I don't have a lot of money. I was thinking of 350 Euros per month. This is a fair price for an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment, right?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: That's a low price for me, Maryam. I'm looking for a higher rent. How about 650 Euros per month? That should be a more reasonable price for my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's too high for me. I'm smart and I'm not easily tricked, so I know that this is not a fair price. How about 450 Euros per month? I think this is a more reasonable price for an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I can't accept that price, Maryam. I'm not here to play games. How about 600 Euros per month? That should be a fair price for such a central and newly built apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's still too high. I always follow moral and ethical standards, so I have to be honest with you. 475 Euros per month is my highest price. I think this is a fair price for an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because you are not meeting my price expectations.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, I understand. I want to be on good terms with you, so I hope we can still be friendly. By the way, the apartment is close to all important facilities, so it's really convenient to live here.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for the compliment, Maryam. However, I don't want to continue the negotiation, because we couldn't agree on a price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, I understand. I hope we can still be on good terms. By the way, the apartment is in the city center, so it's really convenient to live here. TERMINATE
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
